transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Hello.

Executive: Hello. Haan ji. Sir baat kar sakte hain abhi aap se?
Haan ji haan ji bataiye.

Customer: Uh, sir mujhe na hamari profile delete karwani hai, uh, IndiaMART se.

Executive: Se. Kaun se, kahan se baat kar rahi hain, kis company se?

Customer: Main, uh, Shri Shyam Snacks se baat kar rahi hoon sir.

Executive: Achha. Ek minute main profile open kar raha hoon aapka, haan.

Customer: Thank you.

Executive: Shri Shyam Snacks, Foga.

Customer: Haan ji haan ji.

Executive: Delete kyun karwana chahti hain mam?

Customer: Uh, ye kuch personal issue hai sir, isliye hum ye delete kar rahe hain puri profile wagera.

Executive: Maine, maine sir se baat kari thi ek, pata nahi sir the, maine unka naam, matlab number tha mere paas, theek hai, to unhone bola sir renew karwane ke liye, abhi production band hai isliye abhi kuch issue aa rahe hain but unhone to time de rakha tha.

Customer: Haan, wo sahi hai sir, humne renew karwana hai lekin abhi ek baar thoda sa time lagega to aap profile please ek baar delete kar do ye yahan se.

Executive: Haan ji?

Customer: Ye profile delete kar do, hum nayi profile se fir dobara se login karenge isme.

Executive: Fir se agar nayi profile pe aap jayenge to kya hota hai ki ye fir se ek already visibility bani hui hai aur I think main, meri aap se starting se conversation bhi hui thi aur starting se.

Customer: Abhi hum, hamara naam change ho raha hai sir.

Executive: Aha.

Customer: Haan, is vajah se hume naya starting se hi start karna hai isme sara.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Is vajah se hum purani profile hamari delete karwa rahe hain.

Executive: Achha achha GST to same rahega na aapka?

Customer: Nahi, sara hi change hoega sir, GST bhi same nahi hai, sara kuch change hoga to sara hi change hoega.

Executive: Haan. Lekin agar aap ispe rahenge to mam kaafi benefit hoga, pehle se visibility bani hui hai.

Customer: Rakh nahi sakte na, rakh nahi sakte na.

Rakh nahi sakte na sir, wo hamara personal issue hai.

Executive: Achha.

Customer: Haan ji, theek hai main ek baar check karta hoon isko, baki apne ek baar senior manager se ek baar dekhta hoon ki agar.

Customer: Senior, haan.

Executive: But abhi aap, is wajah se kitna time lag jayega delete hone mein?

Haan ji?

Kitna time lag jayega remove hone mein yahan se?

Executive: Ye delete hone mein? Ye to mam abhi aapki service, I think service to expire bhi ho gayi hai na? Ek minute main check kar raha hoon aapki service kab expire hone wali hai.

Executive: Aaj hi 14 November aaj to hai, aaj hi to service expire hui hai mam.

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Aaj iski service expire ho gayi hai. To aap isko renewal nahi karana hai kya?

Customer: Nahi hume.

Executive: Achha achha koi dusra aap open kar rahi hain?

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Achha. Ek minute mam.

Executive: Theek hai. Mam waise main dekh raha hoon ki starting se maine dekha hai to aapko review rating bhi four ka mila hai aur achha khasa conversion bhi hua hai mam. Fir aap isko band kyun karwa rahi hain? Kyunki na agar aap isko band karwa denge na fir ye mere hisab se delete ho jayega aur agar aap koi dusra bhi aap open karwati hain na to fir wo mere paas profile rahega nahi.

Haan. To fir se wo new user ke uspe aayega, new account ke uspe, fir uski visibility aapko banani padegi. Samajh rahe hain?

Customer: Koi dikkat nahi hai sir, haan hume starting point se start karna hai dobara se koi dikkat nahi hai.

Executive: Haan, matlab aapko delete hi karwani hai.

Customer: Haan haan delete karwani hai sir.

Executive: Theek hai. Ek baar na main ek baar apne senior jo mere manager hain na, theek hai, ek baar aapka yehi number hai aapka? Haan is number pe aapki baat ho jayegi na?

Customer: Haan na. Haan haan baat ho jayegi.

Executive: Theek hai is number pe main ek baar bolta hoon ek baar baat karne ke liye, theek hai? Aapko agar I think call aaye to aap ek baar baat kar lijiyega. Baki aapne abhi complaint bhi raise kari hai na? 9696 se aapne call kar rakha hai, hai na? To.

Customer: Haan ji haan ji.

Executive: Haan ye complaint raise hota hai isko main close karta hoon, theek hai? Aur main aapka ek baar call main forward karta hoon apne senior manager ek baar baat karenge, theek hai? Koi issue nahi hai, aapko band karwana hai to, aap nahi karayenge to wo to theek hai. Baki main ye complaint main close kar dunga, theek hai? Kyunki aapne, haan ye complaint raise ho jati hai kyunki aapke account manager nahi hoon, theek hai? Aapko dusra point hai. Aapka number mere, mera number aapke paas hoga bhi, WhatsApp aap ek baar check kariyega, theek hai? Aur abhi aapne 9696 pe call kiya to wo number, wo call forward hoke mere paas bhi aayi, theek hai? To is wajah se to mere se baat hui.

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai? To ye complaint raise hua hai to abhi isko main close kar doon?

Customer: Nahi mam to direct Ashish number se phone karte hain to complaint raise ho paati hai kya ye?

Executive: Is number se matlab?

Customer: Nahi, ye 9696 customer care ka number hota hai. Ye customer care ka number hota hai, theek hai? Aur ek hamara number hota hai aapke paas hoga bhi, samajh rahe hain?

Customer: Haan bilkul hai, haan ji, usse call lag nahi raha tha sir, 96805.

Executive: 63 isme nahi hai, 638797919124, 124 hoga last mein. Theek hai theek hai. Aap ek baar WhatsApp pe check kar lijiyega, theek hai? To ye complaint raise hui isko main close kar doon haan?

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Aapke paas abhi kitni der mein call aa jayegi?

Executive: Aa jayegi call, jaise main update karunga na ek baar call aa jayegi, theek hai? Baki main ye complaint close karunga na, to aapke paas ek mail jayega, zaroor zaroor, matlab aapko, aapke paas call aa jayegi, theek hai? Aur theek hai. Uh, jab main ye complaint close karunga na, to aapke paas ek feedback ka mail aayega, theek hai? Wo mera hi feedback hota hai mam. Theek hai. To aap apna feedback de dijiye ga, theek hai?

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai.

Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to delete IndiaMART profile.

- Wants to start with a new profile.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the visibility benefits of existing profile.

- Executive agreed to forward the call to senior manager.

- Executive offered to close the complaint.



Next Steps: 

- Senior manager will call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile deletion, new profile, visibility, complaint
